mapper.update:
update B_GOOD
SON_ID = #{sonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOOD_NAME = #{goodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INFORMATION = #{information,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

SECOND_PRICE = #{secondPrice,jdbcType=FLOAT},

where GOOD_ID = #{goodId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
